amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC. __. The total amount of appropriations made available by this Act is hereby reduced by $293,900,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the total amount of appropriations made available by this bill by $293,900,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 311 (Roll no. 483).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 311 (Roll no. 483).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Woolsey.
